Uses of Package
org.drasyl.plugin

Packages that use org.drasyl.plugin
Package
Description
org.drasyl
Core API that includes the DrasylNode and DrasylConfig.
org.drasyl.behaviour
Describes DrasylNodes as finite state machines.
org.drasyl.plugin
Flexible extensions of drasyl via plugins that can be loaded into the pipeline together with user-defined settings.
org.drasyl.plugin.groups.client
The groups client plugin.
org.drasyl.plugin.groups.manager
The groups manager plugin.
  • Classes in org.drasyl.plugin used by org.drasyl
    Class
    Description
    DrasylPlugin
    This interface is implemented by all drasyl plugins.
    PluginManager
    The PluginManager notifies all enabled plugins about specific node events (like startup or shutdown).
  • Classes in org.drasyl.plugin used by org.drasyl.behaviour
    Class
    Description
    PluginManager
    The PluginManager notifies all enabled plugins about specific node events (like startup or shutdown).
  • Classes in org.drasyl.plugin used by org.drasyl.plugin
    Class
    Description
    PluginEnvironment
    Models environment information of a DrasylPlugin that are required by the plugin.
